project.Title: The Heir Class Mod
project.ItemDescription:
[h1] === Summary === [/h1]
First ever mod, yaaay. The Heir is a healer/damage dealer based in the backline. She uses occult magic and channels it through her book.
[i] "Born too late to enjoy the family's once plentiful luxury, The Heir was instead raised within a cult. Growing up learning the same research that drove her Ancestor mad, The Heir instead has drawn power from the ancient incantations, deadly to foes and able to provide uncoventional healing to her teammates." [/i]
[h1] === Comic === [/h1]
[img] https://66.media.tumblr.com/6575156a8ffb653eb3c4daa4a3c7c143/tumblr_plhas7JyR91qcqzlio1_1280.png [/img]
[h1] === Skills === [/h1]
[img] https://66.media.tumblr.com/d4ede82c8a34154e050bfb4d9b46cda5/tumblr_pljyj7RUoL1qcqzlio1_75sq.png [/img] [b] Protect Me [/b] Launch from 1-4 Standard protect, 3 uses, To Defender: +Dodge +Prot [img] https://66.media.tumblr.com/899e939fd505b0110b62a1c91c3c0f75/tumblr_pljyj7RUoL1qcqzlio2_75sq.png [/img] [b] Roses Vine [/b] Launch from 2-4 Strikes 1-2 Single target damage attack, Marks Target, Causes DOT Bleed on enemy [img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/a60536e0100ab0a1b58084ceb4bd63d9/tumblr_pljyj7RUoL1qcqzlio3_75sq.png[/img] [b] Roses Offering [/b] Launch from 1-2 Strikes 1-2 Moves Heir back two spaces to get her out of the front lines, Buffs Dodge and Speed. [img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/4c56754b001f2593066b532542405e6b/tumblr_pljyj7RUoL1qcqzlio7_75sq.png [/img] [b] Divine Communion [/b] Launch from all positions Single Target heal, Buffs Target's Dodge [img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/90d95fe727719ccd72e5fc3cdf09cf5f/tumblr_pljyj7RUoL1qcqzlio4_75sq.png [/img] [b] Bloom [/b] Launches from 3-4, Single target buff: +DMG +ACC +CRT [img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/650f077752bca7087ce6a99233d2c9d3/tumblr_pljyj7RUoL1qcqzlio5_75sq.png[/img] [b] Roses Thorn [/b] Launches from 1-4, Strikes 3 and 4 Smaller damage attack that causes DOT Bleed [img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/3b562f10f8646eb99dcef05d5a58f12d/tumblr_pljyj7RUoL1qcqzlio6_75sq.png[/img] [b] Roses Embrace [/b] Launches from 3-4, full party heal.
[h1] === Camping Skills === [/h1] [img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/cbe4e46fb84679999eb2ce1b30e7b6e2/tumblr_pljzm8Fc9L1qcqzlio1_75sq.png [/img] [b] Research [/b] Prevent Nighttime Ambush -20% Party Surprise +20% Monster Surprise [img] https://66.media.tumblr.com/181c6934d46646264545e2261df8b1ec/tumblr_pljzm8Fc9L1qcqzlio2_75sq.png[/img] [b] Ritual [/b] +10 Acc +5 Speed Non Religious: +7 Stress Religious: +10 Stress [img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/9d7e34d6b77b5ae41634847f15424a9c/tumblr_pljzm8Fc9L1qcqzlio3_75sq.png[/img] [b] Rummage [/b] Produces random supply item [img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/dd1f6fc51c44f1b29e32e2e7e271e1ce/tumblr_pljzm8Fc9L1qcqzlio4_75sq.png[/img] [b] Study [/b] +25% Scouting Chance
[h1] === Random Facts === [/h1] - Her default name is Rose. - She's meant to be around 22. - I consider her to be one of the Ancestor's (no doubt many) grandchildren.
